auth.tooManyVerificationRequests: Too many verification requests. Please try again later.
auth.passwordResetEmailSent: If an account with this email exists, a reset link has been sent.
auth.nameTooLong: Name can be at most 255 characters
auth.displayNameTooLong: Display name can be at most 100 characters

auth.accountDeleteError: Error deleting account. Please contact support.
